thread.title: The Futuristic Hair Dryer That Got Lady Gaga Ready For the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: The Futuristic Hair Dryer That Got Lady Gaga Ready For the Super Bowl

author: Kelsey Garcia
title: The Futuristic Hair Dryer That Got Lady Gaga Ready For the Super Bowl
text:
Lady Gaga Using a Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer The Futuristic Hair Dryer That Got Lady Gaga Ready For the Super Bowl February 5, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 The Futuristic Hair Dryer That Got Lady Gaga Ready For the Super Bowl 
Leading up to her highly anticipated Super Bowl performance, Lady Gaga pumped herself up by dramatically rocking out with some wind in her hair thanks to her luxurious Dyson Supersonic Hair Dryer . . . as one does. 
In a video shared to Instagram on Feb. 5, Gaga whipped her hair around as someone nearby blew the futuristic hair dryer on her for dramatic effect. Then, in another video, Gaga prepped for a pre-Super Bowl press conference with some eye masks and the same aforementioned dryer. 
The Supersonic Hair Dryer was released by Dyson in 2016 to extremely positive reviews. The incredibly high-tech product is powerful without being heavy and bulky. At $399, it is a serious investment, however, it is considered to be one of the best dryers currently on the market. 
Look ahead to see Gaga glamorously getting ready. Related:
